interpretation: The Eye in Speech Bubble card represents the power of observation and communication. It suggests that you should be more aware of your surroundings and the people around you. Pay attention to non-verbal cues and body language, and use your intuition to understand what is not being said. This card also encourages you to express your thoughts and feelings clearly and openly. Speak your truth and listen to others with an open mind. The Eye in Speech Bubble card invites you to explore different perspectives and broaden your horizons. It is a reminder that sometimes, silence can be just as powerful as words. Trust your instincts and use your words wisely. This card encourages you to be present and engaged in your interactions with others, and to be mindful of the impact of your words and actions.
